Generate, refactor, and debug code with AI assistance.

onboarding: Your task list in this workspace is empty.

customizableModes.title: Customizable Modes
customizableModes.description: Specialized personas with their own behaviors and assigned models

enhancePromptDescription: The 'Enhance Prompt' button helps improve your prompt by providing additional context, clarification, or rephrasing. Try typing a prompt in here and clicking the button again to see how it works.
typeTask: Give PearAI Agent a task here!
addContext: @ to add context, / to switch modes
dragFiles: hold shift to drag in files
dragFilesImages: hold shift to drag in files/images

checkpoint.initializingWarning: Still initializing checkpoint... If this takes too long, you can disable checkpoints in <settingsLink>settings</settingsLink> and restart your task.

menu.restoreFilesDescription: Restores your project's files back to a snapshot taken at this point.
menu.restoreFilesAndTaskDescription: Restores your project's files back to a snapshot taken at this point and deletes all messages after this point.

instructions.wantsToFetch: Agent wants to fetch detailed instructions to assist with the current task

fileOperations.wantsToRead: Agent wants to read this file:
fileOperations.wantsToReadOutsideWorkspace: Agent wants to read this file outside of the workspace:
fileOperations.wantsToEdit: Agent wants to edit this file:
fileOperations.wantsToEditOutsideWorkspace: Agent wants to edit this file outside of the workspace:
fileOperations.wantsToCreate: Agent wants to create a new file:
fileOperations.wantsToSearchReplace: Agent wants to search and replace in this file:
fileOperations.didSearchReplace: Agent performed search and replace on this file:
fileOperations.wantsToInsert: Agent wants to insert content into this file:
fileOperations.wantsToInsertWithLineNumber: Agent wants to insert content into this file at line {{lineNumber}}:
fileOperations.wantsToInsertAtEnd: Agent wants to append content to the end of this file:

directoryOperations.wantsToViewTopLevel: Agent wants to view the top level files in this directory:
directoryOperations.didViewTopLevel: Agent viewed the top level files in this directory:
directoryOperations.wantsToViewRecursive: Agent wants to recursively view all files in this directory:
directoryOperations.didViewRecursive: Agent recursively viewed all files in this directory:
directoryOperations.wantsToViewDefinitions: Agent wants to view source code definition names used in this directory:
directoryOperations.didViewDefinitions: Agent viewed source code definition names used in this directory:
directoryOperations.wantsToSearch: Agent wants to search this directory for {{regex}}:

mcp.wantsToUseTool: Agent wants to use a tool on the {{serverName}} MCP server:
mcp.wantsToAccessResource: Agent wants to access a resource on the {{serverName}} MCP server:

modes.wantsToSwitch: Agent wants to switch to {{mode}} mode
modes.wantsToSwitchWithReason: Agent wants to switch to {{mode}} mode because: {{reason}}

subtasks.wantsToCreate: Agent wants to create a new subtask in {{mode}} mode:
subtasks.wantsToFinish: Agent wants to finish this subtask
subtasks.defaultResult: Please continue to the next task.
subtasks.completionInstructions: Subtask completed! You can review the results and suggest any corrections or next steps. If everything looks good, confirm to return the result to the parent task.

autoApprove.title: Auto-approve:
autoApprove.description: Auto-approve allows Roo Code to perform actions without asking for permission. Only enable for actions you fully trust. More detailed configuration available in <settingsLink>Settings</settingsLink>.

announcement.description: Agent 3.14 brings new features and improvements based on your feedback.
announcement.feature1: Improved Editing Tools: The search_and_replace and insert_content tools have been improved and graduated from experimental status
announcement.feature2: Diff Apply Fixes: We continue to work on improving the apply_diff tool
announcement.feature3: <bold>Tons of Other Improvements</bold>: Numerous fixes and enhancements throughout the extension
